elements.text: The map function draws the map onto the screen. NOTE: As of 0.1.0d,

--draws the map to the screen.
map()

mx
  Number of tiles from the left.
my
  Number of tiles from the top.
sx
  Number of pixels to the right of the mx.
w
  The width of the displayed area.
w
  The height of the displayed area.
layer
  What map file is being displayed (MAY BE INCORRECT).
Leaving parameters blank will use the defaults:
0,0,0,0,16,16,0

NOTE: As of 0.1.0d, the map() function does not work.
Due to this, this page may not be fully accurate.
